author: Staff Reporter
text: The Pattali Makkal Katchi has started talks for alliance with a few parties. The details will be known in the coming days, the party’s Chief Ministerial nominee, Anbumani Ramdoss, said here on Friday. Addressing reporters outside the Coimbatore Airport on Friday, he said that the party, unlike the two big Dravidian parties that are engaged in a war of advertisements that were bad in taste, the PMK was for decent, development politics.
title: Coalition talks underway: PMK
